events.name: OWASP BHOPAL MEETUP - YARA RULES 101
events.description:
As Owasp Bhopal Community we have come up with Jan-2020 Monthly meet for the Community.

There will be a one-hour session on the topic "YARA RULES 101" by Lakshya Dubey.

It will be a fully virtual meetup and the details Regarding The virtual platform will be communicated shortly.

events.name: Getting back into the Groove
events.description: We've been on pause during the pandemic, but I thought I'd try running a virtual meetup and see how it goes. For this first one, it'll just be a meet and greet event, let us catch up from the last six months and see if there's interest in having virtual meetings. If so, we'll get something more substantial planned for September.
